mapper.select: select from channel_info where sn= #{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select from channel_info where name like CONCAT('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
select running_state from channel_info where sn = #{sn} and name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update channel_info set running_state = #{runningState} where sn = #{sn} and name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select from channel_info order by id limit 1
